briefTitle: Real-World Effectiveness of Palbociclib in Combination With an Aromatase Inhibitor
officialTitle: Real-World Treatment Effectiveness of Palbociclib in Combination With an Aromatase Inhibitor as 1st Line Therapy in Metastatic Breast Cancer
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Overall Survival (OS) in Postmenopausal Female or Male Participants With Metastatic Breast Cancer
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Confirmed HR+/HER2- status after MBC diagnosis.
* Received palbociclib + AI or AI as first-line therapy

Exclusion Criteria:

* Evidence of prior treatment with other CDK4/6I, AI, tamoxifen, raloxifene, toremifene, or Fulvestrant for MBC
* First structured activity greater than 90 days after MBC diagnostic date
* Treatment with a CDK4/6 inhibitor as part of a clinical trial
